name: Super Jungle Wrestling
description:
Super Jungle Wrestling

In the Furry Kingdom of Maxicador, wrestling is a popular entertainment. Can you beat the champion El Bullito?

To win, reach exactly 21 before your opponent, and you lose if you go over 21. But this is wrestling, nothing is set in stone. You get a Second Chance mode if you lose and you can achieve an unexpected come from behind!
